org.nanoko.java

Class NodeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nanoko.java.NodeManager

  • public class NodeManager
extends Object
    A class managing node and npm Must be sure that .npmrc file does not set the prefix.

      • installIfNotInstalled

        public void installIfNotInstalled()
                           throws IOException
        Installs node in ~/.wisdom/node/$version. The installation process is the following:
        1. download node
        2. expand node to the right location
        3. download npm
        4. expand npm

        Node and npm installation are divided to avoid facing npm corruption on node package.

        Throws:
        IOException
